<a id="OfflineMultiplayerPeer"></a>

# OfflineMultiplayerPeer

**Inherits:** [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) **\<** [PacketPeer](PacketPeer.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) which is always connected and acts as a server.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is the default [MultiplayerAPI.multiplayer_peer](MultiplayerAPI.md#MultiplayerAPI_property_multiplayer_peer) for the [Node.multiplayer](Node.md#Node_property_multiplayer). It mimics the behavior of a server with no peers connected.

This means that the [SceneTree](SceneTree.md) will act as the multiplayer authority by default. Calls to [MultiplayerAPI.is_server()](MultiplayerAPI.md#MultiplayerAPI_method_is_server) will return ``true``, and calls to [MultiplayerAPI.get_unique_id()](MultiplayerAPI.md#MultiplayerAPI_method_get_unique_id) will return [MultiplayerPeer.TARGET_PEER_SERVER](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_constant_TARGET_PEER_SERVER).
